answers.answer: Is there more to this story?

The use of the antipsychotic medication Seroquel has been linked to an increased risk of diabetes, pancreatitis and death. Thousands of Seroquel lawsuits have been filed throughout the United States by individuals who suffered severe and life threatening injuries.

Yes, Kenkeith is correct.  There have been many filed against Eli Lily & Co & AstraZeneca, as a matter of fact. The lawsuits were filed because the companies failed to warn of the risks involved with the problems Ken has mentioned and also strokes.  Take care, Ally

title: wifes death
